mapper.select: SELECT a.id,a.content,a.schedule_type,a.company_id,a.start_time,a.end_time,b.member_id,c.user_id,b.id as schedule_member_id FROM maoding_web_schedule a INNER JOIN maoding_web_schedule_member b on a.id = b.schedule_id INNER JOIN maoding_web_company_user c on b.member_id = c.id where a.start_time > now() and a.deleted = 0 and a.status = 0 and b.`status` != 2 and b.deleted = 0 and b.is_reminder = 0 and round((UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.start_time)-UNIX_TIMESTAMP(now()))/60) <= b.reminder_time
